Name: Village Defender
About the game: 【Village Defender】is a simple and easy-to-use city defense survival game. To fight against waves of enemies, we also need our troops to defeat enemies on the battlefield to earn money to enhance our strength. Be a stronger enemy!!! In addition to personal ability level equipment, the game also combines card elements, which will definitely affect the development of each battle!!!
